comment.author: 76016463@N00
comment._content: Famous pitcher of his era, shown here as player-manager of the New York Yankees in 1915. "William Edward Donovan (October 13, 1876 – December 9, 1923), nicknamed Wild Bill, was an American right-handed pitcher and manager in Major League Baseball." en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Bill_Donovan SABR biographical sketch: sabr.org/bioproj/person/55c38ae8
